item.title: Key West Sunset Sail with Full Bar, Live Music and Hors D'oeuvres
item.description: Watch the sun set and the moon rise off the coast of Key West on this sunset cruise. Enjoy the scenery and peaceful calm of a late afternoon sail aboard a 70-foot catamaran with plenty of deck space to stretch out and enjoy the breathtaking view. Then watch a legendary Key West sunset as the sun glistens and gently settles into the water. Hearty appetizers plus champagne, wine, full liquor bar, ice-cold beer and soft drinks are included.

image.alt: Key West Sunset Sail with Full Bar, Live Music and Hors D'oeuvres

item.title: Shark and Wildlife Viewing Adventure in Key West
item.description: Get up close with sharks and other marine wildlife on this boat tour from Key West. Travel on board an eco-friendly, 34-foot catamaran just a few miles off the coast of Key West. See dolphins, stingrays, turtles and birds and learn about Key West’s waters, and then watch as the pilot drops bait to draw a variety of sharks right to the edge of the boat. Bring a camera to capture the excitement as these super predators swarm. Cold drinks, snacks and polarized sunglasses are included on this Key West shark cruise.

image.alt: Shark and Wildlife Viewing Adventure in Key West

item.title: Guided Bicycle Tour of Old Town Key West
item.description: Ride through the streets of Old Town Key West during a leisurely bicycle tour—a perfect introduction for first-time visitors. Learn about the island's history and see highlights such as Mallory Square, Mile Marker Zero, and White Street Pier. Pedal out to the Southernmost Point Buoy and enjoy panoramic ocean views. Plus, choose from morning or afternoon times to easily fit this tour into your schedule.

image.alt: Guided Bicycle Tour of Old Town Key West

item.title: Key West Mangrove Kayak Eco Tour
item.description: Paddle a kayak through mangrove creeks and shallow water on a Key West kayaking tour that offers an up-close look that this unique coastal environment. This guided tour is the perfect way to spot Florida wildlife in a natural habitat.

image.alt: Key West Mangrove Kayak Eco Tour

item.title: PM Half-Day Trip from Key West with Kayaking, Snorkeling & Sunset
item.description: Get ready for fun in the sun on this half-day sailing, kayaking and snorkeling adventure off the coast of Key West. Choose from a morning or afternoon excursion and set sail. Kayak through a maze of mangrove-canopied canals and streams, home to a tropical array of birds, rays, sharks, sport fish and more. Then jump into the water for a snorkeling session above a coral reef with 600 different species of marine life. Relax, feel the warm sea breeze and enjoy the day. Snacks, beer, wine, sodas and water included.

image.alt: PM Half-Day Trip from Key West with Kayaking, Snorkeling & Sunset

item.title: Southernmost Food & Cultural Walking Tour by Key West Food Tours
item.description: Eat your way around Key West on this food tour with a guide who introduces you to 'mom and pop' eateries in the Old Town historic district. Taste seafood, Cuban cuisine, and, of course, key lime pie. The walking tour route takes you off typical touristy streets so you can see Key West like a local, listening to insights about the city's food, architecture, and history along the way. Tastings are enough for a hearty lunch.

image.alt: Southernmost Food & Cultural Walking Tour by Key West Food Tours

item.title: Key West Small-Group Sunset Sail with Wine
item.description: Escape to the still waters off the coast of Key West on this small-group, sunset wine-tasting cruise. Enjoy the scenery and peaceful calm of a late afternoon sail on board a 65-foot schooner. Sample up to eight different wines and/or five different beers. Also included is a gourmet cheese buffet and other appetizers, like summer sausages, water crackers with brie, green apples with a honey drizzle and more. Then watch as the sun glistens and gently settles into the water, a perfect ending to a perfect cruise.

image.alt: Key West Small-Group Sunset Sail with Wine

item.title: Key West Island Adventure Jet Ski Tour: Bring a Partner for Free
item.description: Discover 28 miles (45 kms) of the Floridian coast on a 1.5-hour Jet Ski tour. With several daily tours, you can easily find a time that fits with your schedule. The tour is priced per Jet Ski, so you can ride tandem with a friend at no additional cost. Your guide is on hand at all times to lead the way on your aquatic adventure.

image.alt: Key West Island Adventure Jet Ski Tour: Bring a Partner for Free

item.title: Key West Dolphin Watch and Snorkel Tour - Eco Adventure
item.description: Get ready for fun in the sun on this dolphin watch and snorkeling adventure off the coast of Key West. Cruise away from the island city of Key West and see dolphins swimming alongside the boat, then jump in for a shallow-water snorkel at the Key West National Wildlife Refuge with many different species of marine life. Relax, feel the warm sea breeze and select from a variety of refreshing beverages on board the boat.

image.alt: Key West Dolphin Watch and Snorkel Tour - Eco Adventure

item.title: Adults only Sunset Cruise from Key West with Champagne
item.description: Escape to the still waters off the coast of Key West on this adults-only sunset champagne cruise. Enjoy the peaceful calm of a late afternoon sail on a comfortable catamaran limited to just 14 passengers. Enjoy house champagne, red or white wine, ice-cold beer, a soft drink or bottled spring water, and a gourmet cheese buffet. Then watch as the sun glistens and gently settles into the water, a perfect ending to a perfect cruise.

image.alt: Adults only Sunset Cruise from Key West with Champagne

item.title: Key West Sunset Sail with Live Music, Drinks and Appetizers
item.description: Jam to crowd favorite beats by live musicians, eat, drink, and watch the sunset on this classic party cruise from Key West. Unlimited drinks and appetizers included.

image.alt: Key West Sunset Sail with Live Music, Drinks and Appetizers

item.title: Sunset Sail in Key West with Beverages Included
item.description: Leave behind the crowds of Key West and catch a quintessential Florida sunset while enjoying drinks on a sailboat. There is no better vantage point for watching the sunset over the water than from the water itself. And, while larger sunset cruises can get overcrowded, this small group experience ensures you have a spot at the rail when it comes time to capture photos of the setting sun.

image.alt: Sunset Sail in Key West with Beverages Included

item.title: Key West Full-Day Ocean Adventure: Kayak, Snorkel, Sail
item.description: Save time and money in Key West on this all-inclusive, full-day excursion. Enjoy a day of sailing, snorkeling, and kayaking off the coast. Visit the Key West National Wildlife Refuge and explore an underwater world full of colorful fish and coral. Includes a buffet lunch with unlimited beer, wine, and soft drinks.

image.alt: Key West Full-Day Ocean Adventure: Kayak, Snorkel, Sail

item.title: Key West Schooner Sunset Sail with Bar & Hors d'oeuvres
item.description: Set sail on a replica of the 1851 Schooner America on a cruise from Key West. See the top sights of the city, including Fort Zachary, Mallory Square, and Sand Key Lighthouse from a unique perspective. Your cruise is accompanied by complimentary hors d’oeuvres along with alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages. Allow yourself to truly unwind as the sun sinks into the Atlantic Ocean.

image.alt: Key West Schooner Sunset Sail with Bar & Hors d'oeuvres

item.title: Ultimate Sea Doo Jet Ski Tour of Key West-Additional Rider Free!
item.description: Experience Key West’s tropical blue waterways on this Jet Ski tour along the Atlantic Ocean and/or the Gulf of Mexico. Enjoy panoramic island views and watch for dolphins, stingrays, sea turtles, manatees and more while gliding over warm ocean water. Bring a waterproof camera to capture this southernmost point in the continental United States.

image.alt: Ultimate Sea Doo Jet Ski Tour of Key West-Additional Rider Free!

item.title: Champagne Sunset Catamaran Cruise in Key West
item.description: Experience a sunset you’ll never forget on this 2-hour catamaran cruise in Key West. Sip on your choice of wine, champagne, beer or sangria as you watch the sun go down over the water. As you sail you’ll catch glimpses of the island and marvel at the views from the turquoise water. Cocktails are also available at a cash bar on board.

image.alt: Champagne Sunset Catamaran Cruise in Key West

item.title: Key West Sunset Sail: Dolphin Watching, Wine, and Tapas
item.description: Limited to an intimate number of passengers, this small-group sunset sail includes an up-close look at dolphins as well as views of Key West landmarks like the legendary Mallory Square, Sunset Key, and historic Fort Zachary Taylor. Then, relax on the luxury catamaran to watch the sunset as nibble on tapas such as shrimp cocktail served with wine and champagne.

image.alt: Key West Sunset Sail: Dolphin Watching, Wine, and Tapas

item.title: Island Adventure Eco Tour – Explore Key West’s Hidden Backcountry
item.description: Get access to a remote nature sanctuary, known only to Key West locals, during this island adventure. Choose to paddleboard, kayak, snorkel, or just lounge on the sandbar and take in the natural ambiance. Snack, lunch, and use of snorkel equipment included; wine and beer available after activities.

image.alt: Island Adventure Eco Tour – Explore Key West’s Hidden Backcountry

item.title: Key West Historic Seaport Food & Walking Tour
item.description: Taste your way through Key West's Historic Seaport on a gourmet walking tour with a local guide. You'll stroll from the docks into some of the most colorful neighborhoods in Key West, pausing to sample locally caught pink shrimp, spiny lobster, or other just-as-delicious non-seafood options, learning about Key West history along the way. Don't forget to save room for a refreshing glass of white wine and our famous key lime pie! Exploring Key West on foot is an ideal way to soak up the vibrant atmosphere.

image.alt: Key West Historic Seaport Food & Walking Tour

item.title: Key West Reef Snorkel & Sail Adventure
item.description: Explore the only living coral reef in North America on this small-group snorkeling adventure aboard a sailing yacht in Key West. You will receive instruction on how to use the equipment, but it’s recommended that participants be comfortable underwater and have the ability to swim. Common sightings include tropical fish, eels, turtles, dolphins, anemones, and urchins.

image.alt: Key West Reef Snorkel & Sail Adventure

item.title: Key West SNUBA Experience
item.description: Experience the underwater beauty of southern Florida on a half-day snuba tour from Key West. The snuba apparatus allows you to breathe underwater without cumbersome scuba gear or the need for scuba certification. You’ll travel about to the dive site by boat, then hop in the warm water to get close views of an array of colorful fish and marine life.

image.alt: Key West SNUBA Experience

item.title: Guided Clear Kayak Eco-Tour Near Key West
item.description: Kayaking is a great way to experience the Florida Keys but your views are typically limited to what's above the surface of the water. This small-group tour provides clear kayaks that let you discover the underwater world as well. As you paddle, you just need to look below to spot starfish, tropical fish, nurse sharks, turtles, jellyfish and more.

image.alt: Guided Clear Kayak Eco-Tour Near Key West

item.title: Key West Craft Cocktail Crawl
item.description: Explore Key West through the eyes of a local on a craft cocktail tour that stops at five off–the–beaten–path establishments, from a historic mansion to a boutique hotel that was once a hospital. In addition to navigating for you, your guide uses the city’s bar scene to give you an overview of its history and culture. The tour includes five craft cocktails and two gourmet food tastings.

image.alt: Key West Craft Cocktail Crawl

item.title: Dry Tortugas National Park Day Trip by Catamaran from Key West
item.description: Escape to the secluded islands and tropical beaches off the coast of Key West on this guided, full-day adventure to historic Dry Tortugas National Park. History buffs and outdoor enthusiasts alike will love this unique voyage, where getting there is half the fun on board the Yankee Freedom III, a luxurious, state-of-the-art catamaran. Enjoy snorkeling (equipment provided) in the crystal blue waters and take in the military fort, national park, campground, sandy beaches and coral reefs that make this area special. Breakfast and lunch included.

image.alt: Dry Tortugas National Park Day Trip by Catamaran from Key West
